title: help please
body: I recently had a player in my game who said nothing but constantly spammed the enemy missing ping, and the caution ping on top of me in game; he didn't say much in game, but he was pretty toxic in the after game lobby. I have screenshots of the aftergame lobby which I feel should be sent to riot so that this player can be punished. Where should I send these screenshots?

replies.body:
The best step you can take is to actually report the player in the end-of-game lobby and explain the behavior he was exhibiting in the after-game chat.  This is the best method for us to track these types of players and punish accordingly.

I know you want to take that extra step to make sure justice is served, but if this player continues to do this, he will get a full serving ^.^
